metadata.creator: Office of the President
metadata.description: This volume, "The Presidentâ€™s Report"covers the achievements of the Aquino administration from day one as Pres. Aquino uneasily took over the reins of power until the day she bowed out of it, formidable and steeled. Also, it records the Aquino administration had accomplished from the restoration of democracy to the more palpable one as given in facts and figures. This series of volumes is a complete coverage of the legacies of Aquino presidency.
metadata.subject: Corazon C. Aquino
metadata.title: The Aquino Management Of The Presidency The President's Report 1986 1992
